prompts: What's your idea of a perfect date?
What's your favorite way to spend a weekend?
What's the most adventurous thing you've ever done?
What's your favorite book/movie/TV show and why?
What do you value most in a relationship?
What are you looking for in a partner?
What's your idea of a fun night out?
What's your favorite hobby or activity?

characters.name: Harold the herald
characters.description: He thought this was normal speed dating.
characters.rule: Read the messages sent to the screen.

characters.name: The Jester
characters.description: You used to serve a king. But now you're ready to serve someone else ;)

characters.name: The Pierrot
characters.description: Knock knock... who's there? True love perhaps?

characters.name: The Comedian
characters.description: When you failed at standup, you switched to circus performance. Now that you've failed at marriage it's time to switch strategies agiain.

characters.name: The Slapstick-er
characters.description: You have many positive traits. Neither coordination nor balance are part of that list.
characters.rule: Uses words honk, bang, and boing.
